Keyword.Name: Title
Keyword.Description: General descriptive title given to the image resource.

Keyword.Name: Headline
Keyword.Description: Short description of the full caption.

Keyword.Name: Description
Keyword.Description: Full caption and related description text for the image resource.

Keyword.Name: Subject.Category
Keyword.Description: The type(s) of object or objects in the resource. If objects can be placed into multiple categories in the taxonomy they should all be listed.

Keyword.Name: Subject.Name
Keyword.Description: Proper names/catalog numbers for all of the key objects in the image field.

Keyword.Name: Distance
Keyword.Description: The distance to the object, measured in light years (list element 1) and/or redshift (list element 2).

Keyword.Name: Distance.Notes
Keyword.Description: Comment about the contents of the Distance tag.

Keyword.Name: ReferenceURL
Keyword.Description: Web page containing more information about this specific image.

Keyword.Name: Credit
Keyword.Description: The minimum information that the Publisher would like to see mentioned when the resource is used.

Keyword.Name: Date
Keyword.Description: Date that the resource was created or made available.

Keyword.Name: ID
Keyword.Description: This is an identifier for the resource that is unique to the creator.

Keyword.Name: Type
Keyword.Description: The type of resource.

Keyword.Name: Image.ProductQuality
Keyword.Description: Qualitative image quality assessment.

Category.Name: Observation
Category.Description: The information in this section characterizes the observational data of source datasets used to create the publication-quality image. These include the data sources (facility, instruments, etc), the geometric projection on the sky, and the wavelength/color assignments used for composite images.

Keyword.Name: Facility
Keyword.Description: Telescopes or observatories used for the observations.

Keyword.Name: Instrument
Keyword.Description: Instrument used to collect the data.

Keyword.Name: Spectral.ColorAssignment
Keyword.Description: The output colour, which is assigned to an exposure.

Keyword.Name: Spectral.Band
Keyword.Description: Waveband of the component exposure from a pre-defined list defining the general part of the spectrum covered.

Keyword.Name: Spectral.Bandpass
Keyword.Description: Bandpass of the individual exposure.

Keyword.Name: Spectral.CentralWavelength
Keyword.Description: Central wavelength of the filter used for the individual exposure measured in nanometres.

Keyword.Name: Spectral.Notes
Keyword.Description: Free-text field to allow for more detailed discussions of bandpasses and color mappings.

Keyword.Name: Temporal.StartTime
Keyword.Description: Start time of the exposure in ISO 8601 format.

Keyword.Name: Temporal.IntegrationTime
Keyword.Description: The exposure time the exposure in seconds.

Keyword.Name: DatasetID
Keyword.Description: VO-compliant reference to the dataset (the exposure) used to construct the final image (if available).

Keyword.Name: Spatial.CoordinateFrame
Keyword.Description: Coordinate system reference frame.

Keyword.Name: Spatial.Equinox
Keyword.Description: Equinox for Spatial.CoordinateFrame.

Keyword.Name: Spatial.ReferenceValue
Keyword.Description: Reference coordinates for the image (2 element list in decimal degrees).

Keyword.Name: Spatial.ReferenceDimension
Keyword.Description: Size of the image in pixels (2 element list).

Keyword.Name: Spatial.ReferencePixel
Keyword.Description: X,Y coordinates of the pixel in the image to which the reference coordinate (Spatial.ReferenceValue) refers (2 element list).

Keyword.Name: Spatial.Scale
Keyword.Description: Spatial scale of the image in number of degrees/pixel (2 element list).

Keyword.Name: Spatial.Rotation
Keyword.Description: Position angle of the Y axis in degrees measured east from north.

Keyword.Name: Spatial.CoordsystemProjection
Keyword.Description: A combination of the coordinate system and the projection of the image.

Keyword.Name: Spatial.Quality
Keyword.Description: This qualitatively describes the reliability of the spatial coordinate information in this metadata.

Keyword.Name: Spatial.Notes
Keyword.Description: Free-text description to further expand upon coordinates/geometry of image.

Keyword.Name: Spatial.FITSheader
Keyword.Description: Free-text representation of the FITS header from which the AVM spatial tags were derived.

Keyword.Name: Publisher
Keyword.Description: Publisher of the resource.

Keyword.Name: PublisherID
Keyword.Description: ID of publisher registered as VAMP providers.

Keyword.Name: ResourceID
Keyword.Description: This identifies a specific “instance” of a resource; e.g. one image in one file format at one resolution. This allows the same resource (image) to be offered in different formats and resolutions. Together with the PublisherID, each registered resource is uniquely identified in the database.

Keyword.Name: ResourceURL
Keyword.Description: A unique URL pointing to the specific online image/image archive is needed to identify where to obtain the image. Each ResourceID is paired with a matching ResourceURL.

Keyword.Name: RelatedResources
Keyword.Description: The format is a list of PublisherID/ID values that will reference specific resources registered in VAMP (though not specific “instances”).

Keyword.Name: MetadataDate
Keyword.Description: The date of the metadata content for the image.

Keyword.Name: MetadataVersion
Keyword.Description: This is the version of the applied metadata definition.

Category.Name: Creator
Category.Description: These tags identify the source of the resources (usually organization, not an individual) and would likely not change much from product to product from the same content provider.

Keyword.Name: Creator
Keyword.Description: Original creator of the resource at the organizational level.

Keyword.Name: CreatorURL
Keyword.Description: A simple URL pointing to the (top level) outreach webpage for the original creator.

Keyword.Name: Contact.Name
Keyword.Description: Name(s) of the primary contact(s) for the resource.

Keyword.Name: Contact.Email
Keyword.Description: Email(s) of the primary contact(s) for the resource.

Keyword.Name: Contact.Telephone
Keyword.Description: Telephone number(s) of the primary contact for the resource.

Keyword.Name: Contact.Address
Keyword.Description: Street address of the primary contact for the resource.

Keyword.Name: Contact.City
Keyword.Description: City of the primary contact for the resource.

Keyword.Name: Contact.StateProvince
Keyword.Description: State or province of the primary contact for the resource.

Keyword.Name: Contact.PostalCode
Keyword.Description: Zip or postal code of the primary contact for the resource.

Keyword.Name: Contact.Country
Keyword.Description: Country of the primary contact for the resource.

Keyword.Name: Rights
Keyword.Description: Copyright and related intellectual property rights description.

Keyword.Name: FL.StretchFunction
Keyword.Description: Stretch function applied to the input data in the processing. One StretchFunction per exposure.

Keyword.Name: FL.BackgroundLevel
Keyword.Description: Lower value of input range for the Scale function. One BackgroundLevel per exposure.

Keyword.Name: FL.PeakLevel
Keyword.Description: Upper value of input range for the Scale function. One PeakLevel per exposure.

Keyword.Name: FL.ScaledBackgroundLevel
Keyword.Description: The target lower value of the range of the Scaled image. One ScaledBackgroundLevel per exposure.

Keyword.Name: FL.ScaledPeakLevel
Keyword.Description: The target upper value of the range of the Scaled image. One ScalePeakLevel per exposure.

Keyword.Name: FL.BlackLevel
Keyword.Description: The Stretched Scaled input pixel value, which was set to define the colour black in the output image. One BlackLevel per exposure.

Keyword.Name: FL.WhiteLevel
Keyword.Description: The Stretched Scaled input pixel value, which was set to define the colour white in the output image. One WhiteLevel per exposure.

Keyword.Name: FL.CreationNotes
Keyword.Description: Free-form notes about the image creation process.
